name: messenger
description: This is the backend for the messaging app for the NGINX Microservices March Demo Architecture

scripts.refresh-db: PGDATABASE=postgres CREATE_DB_NAME=messenger_dev node bin/create-db.mjs && node bin/create-schema.mjs && node bin/create-seed-data.mjs
scripts.refresh-db-test: NODE_ENV=test PGDATABASE=postgres CREATE_DB_NAME=messenger_test node bin/create-db.mjs && NODE_ENV=test node bin/create-schema.mjs

author: Javier Evans
